metadata.Title: CVE-2020-16304 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in image_render_color_thresh() in base/gxicolor.c of Artifex Software GhostScript v9.50 allows a remote attacker to escalate privileges via a crafted eps file. This is fixed in v9.51.

notes.Note: Debian> PoC requires de8b6458abaeb9d0b14f02377f3e617f2854e647 (9.27) to trigger

criterions.comment: ghostscript: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
